meanings.sent1: She toiled in the fields from sunrise to sunset.
meanings.sent2: The workers toiled all day to meet their deadline.
meanings.sent3: The ants toiled together to build their anthill.
meanings.sent4: He toiled like a machine, never stopping until the task was done.
meanings.sent5: The students toiled over their homework, determined to succeed.

meanings.sent1: The old car toiled up the steep hill.
meanings.sent2: The hiker toiled through the thick mud in the forest.
meanings.sent3: The snail toiled along the garden path, taking its time.
meanings.sent4: The heavy truck toiled along the bumpy road, struggling to move forward.
meanings.sent5: The turtle toiled across the sandy beach, heading towards the ocean.

meanings.sent1: After hours of cleaning, she toiled and felt completely drained.
meanings.sent2: The marathon runner toiled through the race, pushing his limits.
meanings.sent3: The chef toiled in the kitchen, creating a masterpiece dish.
meanings.sent4: The construction workers toiled under the scorching sun, perspiring heavily.
meanings.sent5: The author toiled over the final edits of his novel, striving for perfection.
